en: Enchant target visible cell: each turn, kill any living object in this cell.
Bury in a random cell to give it Sanctified, then restore lives equal to the cell's value.
Flag a monster when you begin a stage.
You may find duplicate items. When you enter a stage, reduce the minimum power by your highest number of duplicates.
When you spend coins, this transforms into an item worth the amount spent.
Reveal target cell if it's not already open. If the cell has a monster, kill it, otherwise you lose this item.
